original_title: Hackaday Podcast Episode 330: Hover Turtles, Dull Designs, and K’nex Computers
original_content:
What did you miss on Hackaday last week? Hackadays Elliot Williams and Al Williams are ready to catch you up on this weeks podcast. First, though, the guys go off on vibe coding and talk about a daring space repair around Jupiter.
Then it is off to the hacks, including paste extruding egg shells, bespoke multimeters, and an 8-bit mechanical computer made from a construction toy set.
For cant miss articles, youll hear about boring industrial design in modern cell phones and a deep dive into how fresh fruit makes it to your table in the middle of the winter.
Check out the links below if you want to follow along, and as always, tell us what you think about this episode in the comments!

The DRM-free MP3 was stored in a public refrigerated warehouse to ensure freshness. Why not download it and add it to your collection?

title: - 冒険的な宇宙修理とバイブコーディングの世界
body: Hackadayポッドキャストで最新のテクノロジーハックと記事を紹介。
titles: - 冒険的な宇宙修理とバイブコーディングの世界
- 3D印刷で作る卵殻とガラスのペースト押出し
- オープンソースのマルチメーター「ハイドラメーター」の設計
- 8ビットの機械式コンピュータを作ろう！構造玩具での挑戦
- 現代の携帯電話デザインの退屈さを考察する
